title: Degree Conversion Function
description: This function converts an angle in radians to degrees while ensuring that the output value is constrained between 0 and 360 degrees using the MODR function. The input is defined in radians, and the function returns the corresponding angle in degrees.
name: DEG

input.name: rad
input.description: The angle in radians to be converted to degrees.

return_value.description: The angle in degrees, constrained to be between 0 and 360 degrees.
